idea-plugin.name: Auto Switch Input Source In IdeaVim Mode
idea-plugin.description:
Auto Switch Input Source In IdeaVim Mode

For MAC Only

An plugin for auto switching input method while using IdeaVim plugin FOR MAC ONLY
  • Auto switch to English IME while in normal/visual mode
  • Auto switch to the last IME while returning back insert mode
  • Auto switch to the last IME while idea re-focused

    • How to use this plugin

  • 1. download the ImUtil native tool
  • 2. copy the ImUtil to /usr/local/bin/ImUtil
